pages.text: The art of trapping is ancient, dating back to the Stone Age. It is a crystallization of human wisdom against wild beasts. Now, we are no longer terrifying upright apes hunting in groups on the East African savannah. Therefore, trapping is a compulsory course for our outdoor survival. Whether it's defending the shelter or

catching animals, traps are our best choice. We just need to cover them with a layer of leaves, and the rest is waiting for them to jump in. Maybe that's why zombies always want to eat brains, because they're really stupid!
